thread.title: Barry Willingham

author: Barry Willingham
title: Barry Willingham
text: I was tasked with designing T-shirts for a family celebration holiday for 7 adults and 4 children.After googling around I thought that C2O looked the best bet. How right I was ! Very clear and easy to use website, even with my lack of expertise. My design had 3 lines on the front and all the family names on the back so a lot of printing. The cost per T-shirt came out at just less than Â£12 which I thought was exceptional value especially considering the quality of the garments. First class service throughout and will definitely use again .
